description: This PHP class 'JobsController' manages job-related operations such as retrieving failed and queued jobs, retrying failed jobs, and starting the job queue. It interacts with database tables and Laravel's Artisan commands to control job processing.

classes.name: JobsController
classes.description: Controller class handling job management endpoints, including retrieving jobs, retrying failed jobs, and starting the job queue.

methods.name: getJobs
methods.description: Retrieves all failed and queued jobs from the database, compiles their details into an array, and returns a response.

methods.name: retryFailedJobs
methods.description: Retries a specific failed job or all failed jobs using Laravel's Artisan command, based on request input.

methods.name: startJobsQueue
methods.description: Starts the job queue by invoking the Artisan command to retry all jobs.
